text: is a former Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Hayakawa played for Yomiuri Beleza. She was selected Best Eleven in 1990 season. On August 4, 1987, Hayakawa debuted for the Japan national team against Chinese Taipei. She played two games for Japan until 1988. ==Statistics== Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 1987 1 0 1988 1 0 Total 2 0 ==References== Category:Living people Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:Nadeshiko League players Category:Nippon TV Tokyo Verdy Beleza players Category:1949 births Category:Association football midfielders Category:Japan international footballers Category:Tokyo Verdy players
title: Akiko Hayakawa
